response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $1,500,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $1,750,000. This special offer includes a comprehensive training program, dedicated support, and a 1-year warranty on all components.

Considering the investment, I am confident that this product will provide substantial returns for your company. I would love the opportunity to discuss how we can tailor this solution to meet your specific needs and goals. Let's schedule a meeting to explore this further.

Thank you for considering our product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1750000}
